name: Circuit
description: Circuit is a sophisticated oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its sleek design and impressive abilities, Circuit is a true technological marvel. Its body, painted in a striking shade of Rosso Corsa, is equipped with retro console buttons and arms and legs made from durable foundry materials. The screen, in a contrasting red and black color scheme, displays data with extraordinary clarity. To complete its stylish look, Circuit is also adorned with a pair of cool shades. With its exceptional ability_scores, skills, and alignment, Circuit is a valuable asset to the WebtrES club.
